childMarkdownRemark.html: I recently watched Tiger King, and decided it's my life goal to own a tiger. After researching on the internet, I have come to the understanding that tigers are basically just big cats. I owned a cat once, and it was easy. I didnt even have to take him for walks. I don't know how to find the black market on the internet, so if you're a tiger catcher just email me at BigGunZandBBQ@yahoo.com and we can meet in person.
